title: GetHome
body:
You make your way home, you knock on the door.

Ragtime: Welcome home, Jazz. You got anything cool for your ol' folks?
<<if $bebop = true>>
[[The Spirit of Bebop|SpiritOfBebop]]
<<endif>>
<<if $swing = true>>
[[The Spirit of Swing|SpiritOfSwing]]
<<endif>>
<<if $cool = true>>
[[The Spirit of Cool Jazz|SpiritOfCoolJazz]]
<<endif>>
<<if $vanilla = true>>
[[The Spirit of New Orleans|SpiritOfNewOrleans]]
<<endif>>
<<if $inventory = 0>>
[[I got nothing|GetOut]]
<<else>>
[[That's all I got|Judgement]]
<<endif>>

title: GetOut
body:
RagTime: Ya got some nerve showing up on my porch with nothing to show but the clothes on your back.

RagTime: Get out, I say, get out!

[[Continue|BadEnd]]

title: Judgement
body:
<<if $satisfaction > 2>>
RagTime: Haha! You never disappoint Jazz. Welcome home!

[[Continue|GoodEnd]]
<<else>>
RagTime: That's all you got?

[[Jazz: That's all I got.|GetOut]]

<<endif>>

title: SpiritOfBebop
body:
Ahh Bebop! Unrestrained freedom!

<<set $satisfaction = $satisfaction+1>>

[[Jazz: I got more|HomeCheck]]

title: SpiritOfSwing
body:
Swing! Your mother and I will be dancing tonight!

<<set $satisfaction = $satisfaction+1>>

[[Jazz: I got more|HomeCheck]]

title: SpiritOfCoolJazz
body:
I can pracitcally smell the surf! Good job!

<<set $satisfaction = $satisfaction+1>>

[[Jazz: I got more|HomeCheck]]

title: SpiritOfNewOrleans
body:
New Orleans! Good ol' New Orleans! You really got the spirit of our home there jazz

<<set $satisfaction = $satisfaction+1>>

[[Jazz: I got more|HomeCheck]]

title: HomeCheck
body:
Ragtime: More gifts for your daddy-O?
<<if $bebop = true>>
[[The Spirit of Bebop|SpiritOfBebop]]
<<endif>>
<<if $swing = true>>
[[The Spirit of Swing|SpiritOfSwing]]
<<endif>>
<<if $cool = true>>
[[The Spirit of Cool Jazz|SpiritOfCoolJazz]]
<<endif>>
<<if $vanilla = true>>
[[The Spirit of New Orleans|SpiritOfNewOrleans]]
<<endif>>
<<if $inventory = 0>>
[[I got nothing|GetOut]]
<<else>>
[[That's all I got|Judgement]]
<<endif>>
